title: My league cant start up! It crashes on load in!!!?!
body: Hi there everybody! So i was on the updated client and my friend told me to start up the legacy client to play one for all, when i clicked legacy client it deleted my alpha shortcut and league in general. I thought nothing of it and so i went to download league again but everytime I try to start up league it crashes and says "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working" and it force closes my client! I need somebody to help me ASAP as i have been trying to fix this all week :( Thx <3

replies.body:
This *may* be related to the live incident that's ongoing right now, but I'd recommend launching League as admin to confirm this isn't a permissions issue. Simply right-click the launcher and select *run as administrator*.

Let me know if this worked!

oh no.. i can play the game but all the abilities are corrupt! what can i do? if you dont get what i mean well like sona's abilities have a white square instead of the colored circle and at the end of games the screen goes completely white when the nexus is breaking

The missing animations are sometimes related to missing files, but can also be caused by driver issues or hardware failure. I'd recommend working through our [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to address drivers and potentially corrupt files.

Please let me know if you have any questions.
Thx! it started now that i ran as admin.

This just started happening to me again. It's never a permission issue for me. It _usually _happens sporadically around patch dates..  Some days there is absolutely no way league will launch because of that error. And then out of nowhere it works two or three days later. Or reinstalling everything. I wish I knew what it was.
